title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama, providing a simple client to chat, generate, embed, pull, push and manage models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node.js and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, exposing chat, generate and embed interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API with idiomatic Ruby objects.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool for chatting with Ollama models, written in Go.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI completions via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama generators and embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Linux/Windows).

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Official registry of curated Modelfiles for Llama 3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-experiments
summary: Collection of notebooks and scripts exploring function-calling, vision and fine-tuning with Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot using Socket-mode to chat privately or in channels with Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing TypeScript/JavaScript bindings for Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for interacting with Ollama from Python.
